statements: SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status, project_deadline FROM literature_review_projects;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM literature_review_projects;
SELECT * FROM literature_review_projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM literature_review_projects ORDER BY project_deadline DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_deadline FROM literature_review_projects WHERE project_deadline >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status, project_deadline FROM literature_review_projects WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM literature_review_projects WHERE project_deadline < '2023-01-01'
SELECT * FROM literature_review_projects ORDER BY project_status DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM literature_review_projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress' ORDER BY project_deadline ASC
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM literature_review_projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress' OR project_status = 'Completed'
SELECT * FROM project WHERE project_id = 1
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT document_name, author, publication_date FROM document ORDER BY publication_date DESC
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM document WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT document_id, project_id, document_name, author FROM document WHERE author LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY document_id;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE start_date <= '2022-01-01' AND end_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_name, COUNT(document_id) AS number_of_documents FROM project p LEFT JOIN document d ON p.project_id = d.project_id GROUP BY project_name ORDER BY number_of_documents DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_progress;
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM project_progress;
SELECT project_id, project_name, project_status FROM project_progress ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT review_title, reviewer_name, review_date FROM literature_reviews WHERE review_status = 'Completed';
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, review_date, review_title FROM literature_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM project_progress;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project_progress ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT review_title, reviewer_name, review_date FROM literature_reviews WHERE review_status='Approved';
SELECT project_name, project_status FROM project_progress WHERE project_status='In Progress' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT reviewer_name, COUNT(*) AS review_count FROM literature_reviews GROUP BY reviewer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT paper_title, authors, publication_date FROM paper ORDER BY publication_date DESC;

SELECT project.project_name, paper.paper_title, review.reviewer_name FROM project INNER JOIN project_paper ON project.project_id = project_paper.project_id INNER JOIN paper ON project_paper.paper_id = paper.paper_id INNER JOIN review ON review.review_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, start_date FROM project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT paper_title, publication_date FROM paper WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT project_name, paper_title, author FROM project INNER JOIN project_paper ON project.project_id = project_paper.project_id JOIN paper ON project_paper.paper_id = paper.paper_id;
SELECT * FROM review WHERE reviewer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewer_email FROM reviewer WHERE reviewer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM review WHERE submission_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, manuscript_title FROM manuscript ORDER BY project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, project_description FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT reviewer_name, reviewer_email FROM reviewer ORDER BY reviewer_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(manuscript_id) AS total_manuscripts FROM manuscript GROUP BY project_id HAVING COUNT(manuscript_id) > 1;
SELECT review.*, feedback.feedback_text FROM review INNER JOIN feedback ON review.review_id = feedback.review_id;
